name: The Mitch Mod
description:
ModID: 1235222520

The Mitch Mod

+ Increases Encumbrance per attribute point used
    edits: BP_ProgressionSystem (from 7 to 35)

+ Disable camera shake
    edits:  BP_CameraShakeDefault
            BP_CameraShakeHarvestImpact
            BP_CameraShakeHarvestImpactDeflect

+ Increased Elevators Speed

+ Additional levels with attribute points/XP/feats up to level 149
